meanings.definition: Loose-fitting or sagging, especially of clothing.
meanings.sent1: She wore baggy pants to the party.
meanings.sent2: His baggy shirt was comfortable for lounging around the house.
meanings.sent3: The baggy sweater made her look like a cozy bear.
meanings.sent4: The baggy clouds hung low in the sky, promising rain.
meanings.sent5: The baggy sleeves of the jacket flapped in the wind as she ran.
